title: Burn 420,000 REI in the Treasury
body:
It is suggested that the team should burn the 420,000 REI in the Treasury vault, as a result of deleveraging, a large number of REI has been re-issued making its total supply now exceeded 42 million. 

Burn 1% of the total supply to boost community confidence seems is not a bad choice.
author: 0xb1F5dd6746151C73047838694C04B31494511C2C
